        public void startTournament()
                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                            CannotFindException,
                            DuplicatesException
        this method is necessary to start the game
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - exception thrown when file not found
        DuplicatesException - exception thrown when country is duplicated
        CannotFindException - exception thrown when number of country in a continent is different from fixed number
